title: These Are the Trending Hairstyles of 2025, According to Celebrities
description: There's no better motivation to embrace your 'new year, new you' resolutions than with a fresh new hairstyle. Whether it's an edgy bob or a color change, we all know the power a drastic hair transformation can hold to imbue confidence and a new gusto for life. author: Savannah Sitton
excerpt: And here's how to test-run your next look with Arabella Hair.
text: HomeBeautyAnd here's how to test-run your next look with Arabella Hair.Photos: Getty ImagesAnd here's how to test-run your next look with Arabella Hair.There's no better motivation to embrace your 'new year, new you' resolutions than with a fresh new hairstyle. Whether it's an edgy bob or a color change, we all know the power a drastic hair transformation can hold to imbue confidence and a new gusto for life.Celebrities seem to agree, as many have made transformative hair changes already this year, serving as a trend report to some of the haircuts and colors we anticipate seeing more of in 2025. From Zendaya to Christina Aguilera, there are plenty of buzzy styles to inspire you this year. But let's be honest — committing to a dramatic chop or bleach can be terrifying — what if it wasn't what you hoped? Enter Arabella Hair's luxe, high-quality wigs: the best way to test-drive new styles without the commitment. Whether you're looking to experiment for a single night out or imagining a long-term switch, these wigs let you channel red-carpet-ready vibes with ease. Ready to see how they stack up against Hollywood's hottest cuts? Let's dive in.Christina Aguilera is back and better than ever with new signature blonde tresses; a 30-inch wig will give you that hip-grazing length. Thanks to trendsetters like Kendall Jenner and Emily Ratajkowski, understated shades of warm auburn will continue to be a popular take on the 'ginger red' trend this year. To make a statement, "It" girls are turning toward sleek bobs this season, either short à la Zendaya or mid-length like Laura Harrier. html:
• Home
  • Beauty

And here's how to test-run your next look with Arabella Hair.

Photos: Getty Images

And here's how to test-run your next look with Arabella Hair.

There's no better motivation to embrace your 'new year, new you' resolutions than with a fresh new hairstyle. Whether it's an edgy bob or a color change, we all know the power a drastic hair transformation can hold to imbue confidence and a new gusto for life.

Celebrities seem to agree, as many have made transformative hair changes already this year, serving as a trend report to some of the haircuts and colors we anticipate seeing more of in 2025.

From Zendaya to Christina Aguilera, there are plenty of buzzy styles to inspire you this year. But let's be honest — committing to a dramatic chop or bleach can be terrifying — what if it wasn't what you hoped? Enter Arabella Hair's luxe, high-quality wigs: the best way to test-drive new styles without the commitment. Whether you're looking to experiment for a single night out or imagining a long-term switch, these wigs let you channel red-carpet-ready vibes with ease. Ready to see how they stack up against Hollywood's hottest cuts? Let's dive in.

Christina Aguilera is back and better than ever with new signature blonde tresses; a 30-inch wig will give you that hip-grazing length. Thanks to trendsetters like Kendall Jenner and Emily Ratajkowski, understated shades of warm auburn will continue to be a popular take on the 'ginger red' trend this year. To make a statement, "It" girls are turning toward sleek bobs this season, either short à la Zendaya or mid-length like Laura Harrier. Or, if you want to get glam but not spend hours on your hairstyle, a perfectly styled wig of Old Hollywood, brushed-out curls is an instant fix.Trending Haircut for 2025: Auburn Brunette
